output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
```

```{r}
# Web address of Wannasurf zone in Brazil
RioGrandeDoSol_link = "https://www.wannasurf.com/spot/South_America/Brazil/Rio_Grande_do_Sul/index.html"

# Read in html address
RioGrandeDoSol_page = read_html(RioGrandeDoSol_link) 

# Select data table from web and convert into readable format
RioGrandeDoSol_table = RioGrandeDoSol_page %>%
  html_nodes("table#wanna-table") %>%
  html_table() %>% .[[1]]

# **Important, still need to manually enter wave quality and GPS location
```
